metadata.description: Setup, configure, and troubleshoot agent-memory installation

plugins.name: memory-setup
plugins.description: Setup, configure, and troubleshoot agent-memory installation. Use when asked to 'install agent-memory', 'setup memory', 'check memory status', 'configure memory', 'fix memory daemon', or 'troubleshoot memory'. Provides /memory-setup (interactive wizard), /memory-status (health check), /memory-config (configuration management).
